interactivity.requirements: 5 Noriko Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Semi-Constructive Criticism " from Noriko Nakayama Seen " Unpaid Promotion " from Molly MacCormack

progression.synopsis: Sensei visits Noriko at the convenience store again (deliberately, this time). They talk about her job, and she mentions the possibility of going to work at the same maid cafe as Ami and Uta . She thinks she would be able to "bring both the childhood friend trope and the little sister trope to the table", and discovers that it's harder to get her mind off Sensei being her Onii-chan than she thought. Noriko also asks Sensei if there's any chance of Nodoka moving into Sensei's class.
trivia: If Sensei declared himself to be a proud brony , Noriko has heard about it from Kirin â€” she doesn't seem to mind. Otherwise, a reprise of Molly 's unpaid promotion is briefly threatened.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.14.
